com.resistance.theresistance.logic

Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.resistance.theresistance.logic.Round

  • public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
    Round class is in charge of storing each Round of Mission. Purpose is to have an object that contains all the information for each Mission round, that can be stored in Mission more easily.

    • Constructor Summary

      Round(int mission)
      Creates Round object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Round

        public Round(int mission)
        Creates Round object. A Round contains all of the player voting on whether to approve the missionaries. If the team is not approved, a new Round object is created, but the Mission remains the same.
        Parameters:
        mission - the mission number
